website_summaries.verdict: Thick luxurious spa-like pillow with Supergrip suction cups. Inspired by pillows used at high-end spas.
pros: Good for deep bath tubs, doesn't feel too thick or plastic like other, cheaper pillows
Stays in place and has no hard edges or seams
Cradles head and neck well for superior relaxing bath experience
cons: Suction cups may be hard to  remove when bath time is complete
May leak air when leaning against during bath
Seams may split or develop pinholes after time

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this bathtub bumper
customer_reviews.text: This "pillow" is so hard my head barely dented it. That is not the worst problem with the item though - it gives NO neck support whatever. In fact all it does is to force your head foreword making the experience more uncomfortable than simply resting your head on the tub. When you think about it, the most important function of any head pillow, no matter how you are positioned is to support the curved space between your head and shoulders. This item doesn't come close. The best I can say about it is that it is well constructed of sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. Lies

customer_reviews.title: Nice bath pillow, cushy comfort when soaking in the tub.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution to a problem I had. I need to soak in a hot tub semi frequently. I would struggle to use a rolled up washcloth as a bath pillow. Needless to say, it was barely usable. this was something I never heard of, but have needed for years. My next soak was so comfortable I dozed off! The suction cups on the lower section work well, but the top two, not so much. They detatch, but still provide neck support so it isn't that bad. I am glad I found this. A CVS support group recommended it, I tried, and man is this the way to soak away a CVS episode.
customer_reviews.author: FrazierDave

customer_reviews.title: It's was comfortable while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It's was comfortable while it lasted. It immediately developed a leak and filled with water, I noticed it because of the weight. It grew mildew inside. You could tell this because of the weird pattern discoloring coming through and showing on the outside. One day I went to clean it and picked it up and my finger easily poked a whole in the plastic. It lasted less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a $3 inflatable shell pillow that I used for 10 years that I loved. When it finally gave out, I decided to try something a little more expensive and supposedly higher quality. I have now had this one for about a year and am not impressed with it at all. It doesn’t stay in place, the suction cups repeatedly come off, and it makes a weird bubbling noise when you lay on it so you have to keep adjusting if you want to have a quiet relaxing bath.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: By far, one of the best purchases I've ever made. I love how it fits in our apartment's bathtub like a glove.. Makes me linger in the bathtub much longer. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, simple, worth it
customer_reviews.text: My bathtub is not like the one in the product photos. There's very little "lip" outside the basin of my tub (which is a fairly standard shower/tub from an early 2000s United States home), so the top portion of this bath pillow does not lay flat, it leans at a steep angle against the shower wall. That doesn't detract from the product in any way. It still works, and it works well. If you want a cheap, simple bath pillow, this is it. You can stop scrolling.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: All of the suctions broke off after a few months, and mold grew in all the creases, difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Better than most, but treat them right.
customer_reviews.text: I liked my first set of these pillows although I found them a little awkward for my spa, not fitting well in some of the spaces I like to use. I learned a big lesson with them - I never should leave them in the spa after using it. The problem was that the spa cover was too loose and allowed small frogs to get in, and the frogs did their mess on every surface, including leaving permanent stains on the pillows. I haven't started to use the new pair yet, because I'm replacing that spa cover and trying to fix any potential entry point in the lanai (easier said than done!).
customer_reviews.author: bigjimbo

customer_reviews.title: No regerts
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It seems to be made of durable material. It dries fairly quickly after use so I don't worry about it getting moldy or scummy. It sticks well to the side of the tub/shower wall. Because there are so many suction cups, you can adapt its placement to your own tub situation. I received a message from the seller with use/care instructions after ordering which was very much appreciated. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as expected
customer_reviews.text: The great reviews really swayed me on this one, but ugh - it's like we didn't get the same product. The suction cups don't work if you use bath oil, which is half the reason we take baths - and even though another we bought *does work*. This one is thin, not comfortable, and offers no support that I can tell. I'm kind of bewildered that anyone DOES like it. Also, I wouldn't have come on here to leave such a negative review, except that they kept emailing me to prompt me to do so.
customer_reviews.author: J Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great product but intense smell at first
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this pillow. It is very comfy and it really does stay in place like none other I have tried before. No singing, or sliding. My only negative comment would be that it smelled so so chemically for a while after I took it out. I took 2 baths using it before the smell went away. Not relaxing at all! So be warned the smell is intense but it does go away 😊 maybe leave it out and make sure it gets air for a week or so before using if you are sensitive to smell.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Stays suctioned & is very comfortable. Fit my oval, free standing tub perfectly and us super easy to clean. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My tub is pretty much made for tall people. It has a very steep incline so that one would simply sit in the water instead of laying in the tub. As a woman who is not even 5 foot tall I find it hard to just sit in a bath and leave the rest of me to get cold, but it also hurt my neck to try to lay in the tub with it at a 80 degree angle from my body. This has helped tremendously because while there isn’t enough space on my tub for the top suction cups to adhere to the tub, the whole pillow lays flat which provides that angle my head needs to lay comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: EvaElizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a free standing tub that is more "square-ish" so this works great for me. Suction cups are great - do as instructions say - don't pull it off, but squeeze the suction cup - because the suction is so good that if you pull, the suction cup will stick to the tub and pop out of the pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not best if your tub is curved
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this product, not because it's not comfortable or lacking in support when used on a flat ended tub but our soaker tub is an oval shape and this pillow just doesn't sit right on the curve to be as comfortable as the one we're looking to replace. The suction cups are strong and there are helpful stickers telling you where to press down on the pillow to make it stick. If our soaker tub was flat ended, this would be a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: rdavisphoto

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to clean off any mildew
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a bit and then over time it cracked around the seams and started letting water seep in. I threw it away once I realized there was probably mold growing in there. (Before it cracked, it was easy to clean off any mildew. It's definitely a surface stuff tends to grow on, so as soon as the cracks formed, yuck.)
customer_reviews.author: Molly J

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in design
customer_reviews.text: I have one problem with this item. It is SO UNCONFORTABLE. Everything else is great with it...stays on, cleans easily, etc. But when you lay back on it, the seam ends up poking you in the back. The seam is in a terrible spot. So you have hard plastic lines of the fabric sticking into your back. Kind of defeats the purpose of soaking in the tub, right? I waited too long to return it, but I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but may not exactly fit normal tubs
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard tub/shower, and there's not really enough room for the top piece of this to fit on the flat rim of the tub. However, it works well enough to only attach the suction cups on the verticalish part of the tub wall and then when you're in the bath to just flop the top piece back and rest on it, though the suction cups won't attach / stay attached. Definitely an improvement over resting my head on the edge of the tub/wall. I'm even able to lie in the tub more sideways (helpful since I'm pregnant and want my belly in the water!), which would never be an option without any cushioning for head/neck/shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Large suctions keep it in place
customer_reviews.text: I like that this bath pillow has two different sections so it can fit over a curve or bend in the tub/surround. I have tried several other pillows and most have small suctions and I constantly had to keep sticking them back up after they constantly fell down. However, this bath pillow has large suctions which keeps it in place. Mine hasn’t fallen yet and it’s been up for months.
customer_reviews.author: C Reasy

customer_reviews.title: This will change your bath experience
customer_reviews.text: Wow! As someone who has only recently incorporated baths into my self-care routine, I thought I had all that I needed. A nice tray, the perfect bubbles, candles, etc. After using the aforementioned in my bath routine for some time, something still felt missing, as I felt I could be slightly more comfortable. This is it! I could officially hangout in my bathtub all day. And at such a great price comparatively to other bath pillows here on Amazon. I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This might go without saying, but you should make sure this product fits your tub. Mine is standard, but apparently there isn't enough ledge room for the top of this "pillow" to suction onto. The plastic-y feel is also a turn off. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice bath pillow, except for the fact that the suction cups refuse to hold for long in my bathtub. it could partly be caused by the shape of my tub, but the suction cups just don't stick very well. It's comfy enough for a nice long soak and wipes clean quickly after the glitter in the bath bombs gets stuck everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: It does the job, but....
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews, I expected to be wowed, like I was in a high-end spa. Ehhhh....it does the job, but I wouldn’t say it’s amazing or makes you feel like you are in a spa. Perhaps, for what I want, I need to spend more. So, I’m still on the hunt for a bath pillow that knocks me off my feet. This one isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Fs15

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fir right on my tub so there is little neck support but it does its job. I don't feel the cold tub on my back. It does hold like it should but when removing make sure to drag it up and off instead of pulling it off or the suction cups will pull off. They can rip , luckily mine didn't so I just pushed them back in. I notices a weird smell when I opened the package though. It does smell like Mildew. I wasn't sure if its the plastic or the packaging but it is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Finally found what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a pillow that would fit on a "slide in" tub/shower combo. It seemed a lot of these pillows "hung over" the side of tubs. However, this one was perfect. The suction cups are incredibly strong. My only complaint is the material isn't very soft, it's slick. What I do is splash a little hot water on the slick surface and it helps, because if you lean up against it when you first get in the bath it's incredibly cold. However, the material also makes for great cleaning, so you take the good with the bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Truxal

customer_reviews.title: A quality product & a great price too!
customer_reviews.text: I usually always sit in the shower, because I like to relax. This was perfect for resting up against the back of my tub. It's soft & so far the suction cups are still working! After having this in my shower/tub for a few months, there is still no mildew & the pillow hasn't broken down or failed in any way. I'm very pleased with this purchase & would recommend this, especially for the price! If you get one, your back will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bryenn L.

customer_reviews.title: best one ever and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Love it all. Firm yet comfortable to lean on. My tub doesn't allow me to lean back at a nice angle so I needed a pillow that would bring my back forward a little so I would be leaning back perfectly. Without the pillow, my back leans at an angle and my head is straight up and down. Not comfy. I spend 2 hrs in the bath a day, at least because I have chronic pain and the pillow stays comfortable the whole time. I've had many types through the years. This is my all time favorite. Plus you can just wipe it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara R. Klumpyan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad of a pillow but unfortunately it didn't work out as well as I hoped due to the shape of our tubs. I did notice that I must move them after any shower or bath to fully dry otherwise I see stuff getting into the crevices... Just didn't work out for us.
customer_reviews.author: just-one

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I finally used this, twice, during Quarantine. Helps soooo much with trying to relax in the tub. A suction cup popped out, but i put it back on. Make sure you immediately clean with bleach or bathroom cleaner when your done, to avoid sticky sweat from the tub, gerns or other soap residue, from staying on.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, perfect.  Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Comfy!! My tub lip is maybe an inch and a half wide, but works well. As others mentioned do not pull this off the tub. Instead use your fingers to gently lift the suction cups off the surface. I've had no issues with smells, mold. I keep it in its spot even when showering. Of course with each use of the tub/ shower they're washed well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Libby

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful , works ok
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pillow . Suction was ok . When I pulled it off the top , the suction things came off the pillow . But easy to put back on . Although this pillow had a very funky smell to it when I got it . I had to wash it with a lot of soap to get the nasty rubber smell out
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Fell asleep for 2 hours!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't ask for a better pillow. I have to soak 20 min every night for restless legs during pregnancy, and this pillow is perfect! I can lay on either side or upright and be totally comfortable. Bought one for my sister who fell asleep in her tub for 2 hours!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these pillows, and I really like it. The old one was years old and did get dirt on it that I was unable to remove, even with bleach. It was still functional, though. I've tried a lot of bath pillows and this is the best solution I've found.
customer_reviews.author: ArwenOrion

customer_reviews.title: Decent Pillow, Better Options Out There
customer_reviews.text: This bath pillow is overall fine. The main issue I had was with the suction pads coming off if you have to do any adjustments to placement. It also tends to make a hissing noise as air comes out of it when you rest on it. Also slight issues with mildew over time, but that is probably to be expected with most products like this. I believe there are better options for the price for something like this, but it's not a terrible product and is what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An exvellent bath pillow for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bath pillow arrived quickly and well packaged. It is a big step up from blow up pillows I have used in the past. The foam was sturdy and comfortable. It was about an inch thick so its not a puffy pillow and the suctions cups worked very well. An excellent bath pillow for the price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Mc

customer_reviews.title: SO happy to have purchased this
customer_reviews.text: SO happy to have purchased this. Makes relaxing in the bath so comfortable. Right size and shape. Other reviewers comment on suction. One of the best attributes is that it doesn't stick fast to the wall or tub. It moves with you and is easily repositioned as needed when you move. This is a PLUS not a negative. It's plastic encased so it floats if it does slip--so it is easily put back in place. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MLM

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups won’t stick.. at all!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the most highly rated bath pillow on Amazon. Hmmm I’ll let the video speak for itself. My bath tub and wall are smooth, but I can’t for the life of me get the suction cups to stick! I even tried wetting them slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hatton

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work out a lot and didn't like soaking in the tub due to getting a headache from my neck being on the edge of the tub, I could not get comfortable. I got my bath pillow and now I can stay in the tub until the water is getting cold!! I absolutely love this pillow! It stays on the back of the tub with strong suction cups and is so very comfortable! When not in use, I just stick it to the wall of my shower!! Would buy again and again if I ever needed another one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Seevers

customer_reviews.title: After reading all the positive reviews for this item, ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews for this item, I really thought I had finally found THE right bath pillow for me. Unfortunately, after 3 baths the entire pillow became filled with water. Obviously there's a leak in there somewhere. The pillow went out with the trash this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kingman Cat

customer_reviews.title: nice pillow for when taking a bath
customer_reviews.text: The pillow does exactly what I wanted and makes taking a bath more comfortable. The seller also messaged me on tips of how to remove it from the bath since it has suction cups. This was great to know not to pull and do it like the instructed.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, wide.  Could use better suction cups.
customer_reviews.text: Good size and cushioned. Suction cups tended to lose grip as water cools down. Require repeat setting. Though it was soapy film from bubbles during use of jets. Cleaned surface. But problem recurred. Maybe larger cups or deeper ones will help.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and stays put.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this pillow. I had my other one for many years, but it got a hole in it and it was impossible to dry out. I think kids or pets were the reason for the hole so I bought it again. It is comfortable and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: FrequentShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great me time bath pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. Her baths are her me time and it was a much needed accessory that works very well. She’s uses it multiple times a week. Great suction cups for non movement and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: excalibur

customer_reviews.title: Secure and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I gust threw away my old one. This pillow is very comfy and thick doesn’t hurt my neck and it sticks very good to bath surface. Remember to pull up on each suction cup to release it from surface it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: especially when all you want is a nice relaxing soak after a long day
customer_reviews.text: Such a fan of this bath pillow! The last 2 bath pillows I bought didn’t stick to the tub- they were constantly sliding down and needing to be reattached-which is so frustrating, especially when all you want is a nice relaxing soak after a long day. The two panel design provides a soft cushion for my neck and shoulders which is a major plus- I have chronic neck issues so comfort is key. And the “No Questions Asked” warranty is amazing- I don’t anticipate having any problems with this product but I like to know that the brand stands behind the quality and if there is an issue, solving it will be headache-free.
customer_reviews.author: MistyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Cushiony!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bath pillow in the bathtub for neck support. I hope it doesn't mildew with time. So therefore, I can't comment on durability or versatility, yet. I love tub soaks for detoxing with oils and Epsom salts. I had this item on my wish list for quite awhile. Glad I finally purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: A useful and reliabel buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these wonderful bath pillows three years ago. It was very easy to clean by spraying with diluted bleach, but t finally became misshapen and had difficulty with its suction. I used it nearly daily so I ordered another. It arrived promptly. I had bought one locally, but had to return it because none of the suctions worked! I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: M'ette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bath pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as part of a bridal shower gift, and she liked it so much that I came back and bought another one for myself. It's very comfortable, stays put, and really makes the bathtub more relaxing. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Mother slashed the bath pillow.
customer_reviews.text: There’s an inflatable bath pillow that mother and I both enjoy. She claimed it was her day to use it, I maintained she was mistaken, we quarreled. Later, as I prepared to bathe, I noticed to my horror that someone had slashed the pillow. So I got this one as a replacement. It doesn’t disappoint. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart Immediately...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product for its sheer convenience but it's so cheaply made I barely got any use out of it before it fell a part. It is so fragile the back ripped just from trying to take it out of the plastic wrap. After attaching it to my tub, when I tried to adjust its position, the suction holders popped off and I had to repair the pillow several times...mid bath; really defeats the purpose of a relaxing bath. The price is convenient but save yourself the headache/money and get something a bit more durable that doesn't fall a part on its first use.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: We take a lot of baths in my household so the idea of having a "bath pillow" was enticing! I wasn't interested in one that had to be blown up, as then you run the risk of it getting a hole or something in it and not being able to hold air. This looked like the right choice. We've had it now for a couple of weeks and everything works properly. The suction cups stay in place, and there are enough of them! It is easy to clean and maintain. Just what we wanted! I'll update if something changes.
customer_reviews.author: tbrap

customer_reviews.title: I received the pillow in a good amount of time
customer_reviews.text: I received the pillow in a good amount of time. I was excited to use it. The first time I used it I was disappointed that it didn't work like the picture showed. At first I thought - what a waste of money. Before I totally gave up I tried the pillow again. I put it in the tub differently than the picture showed and it worked great. I have used it several times and I am very happy with it. Forget the picture and use it in your tub in a way that works for you. Yes I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: kwdover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pillow for Adding Comfort to Your Bath
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with this as a gift and I LOVE it! I am religious about my bubble baths, and this pillow has made them infinitely more relaxing. The pillow is very comfortable, both the padding (which is very thick and plus) and the material covering it, and the suction cups also work very well. They not only adhere well, but our bath has a very shallow back, unlike the one in the photo, and it stayed perfectly for me with no budging. Very highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This might work better on a different tub
customer_reviews.text: This might work better on a different tub... Mine is the bath/shower style with only maybe an inch or two between the ledge and wall, so this doesn't really fit very well. Because of that, even when I try to wedge it in so that it's comfortable it kind of slips and floats away. Pretty annoying. Final complaint is that it seems to have tiny spots where air can get in, which creates this terrible squealing noise right in your ear. However, I will say that the pillow is well made and in all would probably work well in a tub with more of a ledge.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this bath pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath pillow. I just bought a clawfoot tub and wanted the ultimate spa experience and this pillow added to that. It is quite comfortable and fits the tub well. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice long soak in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Dee

customer_reviews.title: It got pretty disgusting after regular use
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with my bath pillow. Now my decadent bubble baths and epsom salt soaks are in comfort. The last pillow I used was the sea shell shaped one with fabric coating. It got pretty disgusting after regular use. I didn't mind that since it was so inexpensive, but this pillow is more comfortable (bigger area covered more evenly), with multiple suction cups and a material that looks like it will hold up well. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving this pillow!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this pillow!! I'm new to loving baths and after a few I knew I needed a pillow to complete the experience. I purchased this based on the great reviews. The pillow is very firm but squishy in all the right ways. I have had no issues with the suction cups, they're very good quality. I have an oversized oval tub and the back ledge is minimal at best but the pillow contours to the tub just fine and hasn't lost its stick all week. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: KeshiaSkye

customer_reviews.title: Great bath pillow and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This has a great feel to it soft and right size and the suction cups are a good size to help the pillow stick to any smooth surface just make sure there is no soap scum on the surface before placing it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe ICAMO

customer_reviews.title: Adapted it for use with my rough textured hot tub
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow but its suction cups do not stick to the new rough textured hot tubs. So ... I tied a nylon cord about 2 ft. long to one suction cup and passed it thru a hole in a waterproof dog toy and then tied the other end to the other suction cup so now the pillow stays in place with the toy hanging over the edge ...Most anything that has a hole and is waterpoof and unbreakable would work. I will update on how well this work-around works.
customer_reviews.author: pamakarma

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a bath!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very glad I ordered this pillow. I've been trying to take more baths to soak my muscles (I have a bad back) and it's definitely added extra comfort. I've used it a few times so far. I'm having a little trouble getting it to land in a position where it really sticks on my tub (which I think is more a feature of my old, not particularly great tub more than it is the pillow), so it kinda slides or rides up when I move around, but once I settle into a comfortable position it stays.
customer_reviews.author: Aislinn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great! I was having such a hard time enjoying baths because of the hard tub, but this pillow gives me enough support to lay and relax. The texture feels a little plastic (kind of like a pool float), but it's fine for me because I'm in the water anyway. It's also very cushiony so you don't feel the back of the tub. It also stays in place pretty well, depending on the type of tub you have. If you don't have any shelving space around the tub, it probably won't stay up for you though. Overall, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not that comfortable, and it "breathes" slowly (like it's deflating when ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard edges, not that comfortable, and it "breathes" slowly (like it's deflating when you lean on it, then sucking in air when you aren't). I'm worried its filling itself with water and mold. It still works fine enough that I didn't feel the need to return it, but we'll probably try another brand for our next bath pillow.
customer_reviews.author: leviathan2012

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this 5 times a week and it hasnt fell off the wall yet (after buying it 2 months ago). It isnt too thin or too thick. It is actually perfect. It has 2 suctions at the top, 2 suctions at the bottom and one in the middle. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Anderson/Beauty.and.the.bookies

customer_reviews.title: What I always wanted
